title: The One Where Easton Proves How Well He Knows Lala
description:
Lala’s brother Easton returns with an update on how his sex-free 2022 has been going (hint: not well)! He also takes the “How Well Do You Know Lala” quiz, and mostly impresses with his knowledge. Easton and Lala reminisce about getting high together as teens, the time that their dad walked in on Easton gettin’ busy in the basement, and their love of late-night snacking! Plus, Lala was recognized for her sobriety this weekend at the Brent Shapiro Foundation Charity Event, and shares some details from the emotional evening!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
